attributes.action: TSG Status for the Traditional English Breakfast
attributes.additional_details:
We the people petition you the government to support TSG status for the traditional English breakfast.

We ask that you promote our proposal to the European Union to assist us in attaining TSG (traditional speciality guaranteed) status for of our beloved national dish.

Support the English Breakfast Society campaign to protect and preserve the traditional English breakfast !

Read more : http://www.englishbreakfastsociety.com/campaign/
